EunetSwitches.cc

00001 #define NS3_LOG_ENABLE 1
00002 #include "ns3/log.h"
00003 NS_LOG_COMPONENT_DEFINE("EunetSwitches");
00004 #define NS3_ASSERT_ENABLE 1
00005 #include "ns3/assert.h"
00006 #include "ns3/ipv4-address-helper.h"
00007 #include "EunetSwitches.h"
00008 
00009 EunetSwitches::EunetSwitches(const unsigned depth, const unsigned width) :
00010         nDepth(depth), nWidth(width) {
00011         NS_LOG_INFO("creating as a regular tree with depth " << nDepth << " and width " << nWidth);
00012         for (unsigned i = 0; i < depth; ++i) {
00013                 //std::vector<ns3::Ptr<EunetSwitch> > switches;
00014                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < pow(width, i); ++j) {
00015                         NS_LOG_INFO("creating EunetSwitch at depth "<< i << " and width " << j);
00016                         auto p(ns3::CreateObject<EunetSwitch>());
00017                         this->Add(p);
00018                 }//for
00019                 //this->switches.push_back(switches);
00020         }//for
00021         NS_ASSERT(this->GetN() == countTriangle(nDepth));
00022         for (unsigned d = 1; d < nDepth; ++d) {
00023                 for (unsigned w = 0; w < pow(width, d); ++w) {
00024                         NS_LOG_INFO("connecting EunetSwitch "
00025                                         << d << "," << w << " (" << countTriangle(d)+w << ") to "
00026                                         << d-1 << "," << w/width << " (" << countTriangle(d-1) + w/width << ")" << ", " << w%width );
00027                         ns3::Ptr<EunetSwitch> p_from = this->getEunetSwitch(
00028                                         countTriangle(d) + w);
00029                         ns3::Ptr<EunetSwitch> p_to = this->getEunetSwitch(countTriangle(d
00030                                         - 1) + w / width);
00031                         p_from->connectUpTo(0, p_to, w % width);
00032                 }//for
00033         }//for
00034 
00035         NS_LOG_INFO ("assigning IP addresses.");
00036         ns3::Ipv4AddressHelper ipv4_address_helper;
00037         ipv4_address_helper.SetBase("10.0.0.0", "255.0.0.0");
00038         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->GetN(); ++i) {
00039                 ipv4_address_helper.Assign(
00040                                 this->getEunetSwitch(i)->getTerminalDevices());
00041         }//for
00042 }// a constructor
00043 
00044 ns3::Ptr<EunetSwitch> EunetSwitches::getEunetSwitch(unsigned i_depth,
00045                 unsigned i_width) {
00046         return getEunetSwitch(countTriangle(i_depth) + i_width);
00047 }
